lac.runner

Class ConfigExecution

  • java.lang.Object
    • lac.runner.ConfigExecution

  • public class ConfigExecution
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to represent each execution which is or will be performed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructor for the config execution

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigExecution

        public ConfigExecution(java.lang.String nameAlgorithm,
                       Config config,
                       java.lang.String train,
                       java.lang.String test,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> reportType,
                       java.lang.String report)
        Constructor for the config execution
        Parameters:
        nameAlgorithm - name of the algorithm to be run. It only has to have the name, no namespace is required.
        config - The configuration to be used with the previously specified algorithm
        train - Training dataset
        test - Test dataset
        reportType - Types of reports to be generated after training the classifier
        report - Path where the reports will be stored

    • Method Detail

      • getNameAlgorithm

        public java.lang.String getNameAlgorithm()
        Get the name of the algorithm being trained
        Returns:
        the name of the algorithm

      • getClassifier

        public Classifier getClassifier()
        Get the trained classifier
        Returns:
        the generated classifier

      • getTrainReport

        public BasicReportExecution getTrainReport()
        Get the basic report execution for the test phase. It stores the basic information shown in STDOUT.
        Returns:
        the basic report execution for the training phase

      • getTestReport

        public BasicReportExecution getTestReport()
        Get the basic report execution for the test phase. It stores the basic information shown in STDOUT.
        Returns:
        the basic report execution for the test phase

      • getTraining

        public Dataset getTraining()
        Get the training dataset
        Returns:
        dataset for the training phase

      • getTest

        public Dataset getTest()
        Get the test dataset
        Returns:
        dataset for the test phase

      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.lang.Exception
        It runs the configured algorithm. First, it trains the classifier using the training dataset. Then, testing is performed using the test dataset. Finally, all the reports (if they were defined) are generated
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
